name: Tension VR
description:
Solve puzzles quickly while the timer ticks down to bad news. The only playable level puts you in a cage with a couple of pieces on the floor. Put them together to save your life!

Good luck!

This game was made for a personal weekend game jam. The topic was "Tension"

I like doing game jams and a team of people i knew were doing an internal one. I took their topic and did one of my own.

The idea of the game is that you have to quickly solve puzzles to stop bad things from happening to you.

I wanted to create a sense of tension between the player and the world. Like you were fighting for your survival.

Some of the other level ideas include things like

- Trying to escape a room that's flooding

- Trying to stop a vehicle from driving off a cliff that you're stuck in

- Or even as bizarre as trying to figure out how to stop a bear from gnawing away at the cable that's holding the bridge together.

If you want to see more comment below and support the game! I'll even make a version for regular PC!
